I keep fighting to not have impeachment. The process is only completed by a vote in the Senate. Six senators are left to stop.
I did not authorize cash payment 2 to anyone. If there was payment, it was not to my knowledge.
I did not end up with unemployment insurance, unemployment insurance or death pension. We ended up with distortions. It is necessary to review so that there are no undue payments.
What I have is in the Alvorada Palace, little is in Porto Alegre. I hope to take my things there in January 2019.
In democracy, it is essential that votes be respected. My struggle has to do not only with my mandate, but with the defense of democracy in Brazil.
